column3:
I had not actually tested bitcoin-tx with 2a3d988. With a089c50 I can sign a tx like so (already compromised private key):

```
bitcoin-tx -create -json \n'set=privatekeys:["5HpHagT65TZzG1PH3CSu63k8DbpvD8s5ip4nEB3kEsreAnchuDf"]' \n'set=prevtxs:[{"txid":"4d49a71ec9da436f71ec4ee231d04f292a29cd316f598bb7068feccabdc59485","vout":0,"scriptPubKey":"4d49a71ec9da436f71ec4ee231d04f292a29cd316f598bb706
